code: import _objectSpread from"/home/yi/Desktop/rengorum/frontend/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import{FETCH_HOME_REQUEST,FETCH_HOME_SUCCESS,FETCH_HOME_FAILURE}from'../actions/types';const initialState={isLoading:false,forums:null,error:null};const home=(state=initialState,action)=>{switch(action.type){case FETCH_HOME_REQUEST:return _objectSpread({},state,{isLoading:true,error:null});case FETCH_HOME_SUCCESS:return{isLoading:false,forums:action.forums,error:null};case FETCH_HOME_FAILURE:return _objectSpread({},initialState,{error:action.error});default:return state;}};export default home;
